bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with hua xie 滑泄 , smooth outflow. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry wu shi zi 無食 子：主赤白痢，腸滑，生肌肉 , “It controls red and white free-flux illness with intestinal smoothness , and generates muscles and flesh”.

② Illness Sign of thin, uncontrollable stool. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 43: 治小腸虛寒痛，下赤白，腸滑， 胸中懊憹，補之方 , “To cure depletion in the small intestine with cold pain, red and white discharge, intestinal smoothness , and a feeling of vexation in the chest, [use] a recipe for supplementation”.
